# A simple C++ program that generates fractals!

The program can generate four kinds of fractal sets:
* The Mandelbrot Set Z^2
* The Mandelbrot Set Z^3
* The Mandelbrot Set Z^4
* The Burning Ship

I'm going to add more sets in the future.

## Dependencies:
SDL v2.0 (<https://www.libsdl.org/download-2.0.php>)
